name: ThreatStream
description: Integrates a variety of reputation and investigative actions from the Anomali ThreatStream threat intelligence platform

organization_id.description: Organization ID for filtering incidents when polling

actions.description: Test connectivity to ThreatStream by querying the intelligence endpoint

actions.verbose: If nothing is found, this is because ThreatStream has no information on that file.

actions.description: Get information about a given domain
actions.verbose: If nothing is found, this may be due to the format of the domain. Try excluding any subdomains (namely www). If there is still no information found, then it is because ThreatStream has no information on that domain. ThreatStream, however, may still have Passive DNS (PDNS) information on it, which can be found in extra data.

actions.description: Get information about a given IP
actions.verbose: If nothing is found, then it is because ThreatStream has no information on that IP. ThreatStream, however, may still have Passive DNS (PDNS) information on it, which can be found in extra data.

actions.description: Get information about a given email
actions.verbose: If nothing is found, this is because ThreatStream has no information on that email.

actions.description: Execute a whois lookup on the given domain
actions.verbose: ThreatStream returns whois info as a raw string (present in the raw field) which the app will then attempt to parse into the output. Depending on the contents of the raw string, it may not be able to parse all or any of the required fields.

intel_value.description: Intelligence value to filter incidents (ie. google.com)

actions.description: Delete incident in ThreatStream by ID number

incident_id.description: ID number of incident to delete

actions.description: Get incident in ThreatStream by ID number

incident_id.description: ID number of incident to return

fields.description: JSON formatted string of fields to include with the incident

intelligence.description: Comma separated list of intelligence IDs to associate with the incident

actions.description: Update incident in ThreatStream by ID number

incident_id.description: ID number of incident to update

fields.description: JSON formatted string of fields to update on the incident

intelligence.description: Comma separated list of intelligence IDs to associate with the incident - Note that this overwrites, not appends

fields.description: JSON formatted string of fields to include with the observable

example_values: imported by user 13487 Confirmed as false positive
Successfully imported observable. Perform a reputation action if details are not included in this action.

actions.description: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality

container_id.description: Container IDs to limit the ingestion to

start_time.description: Start of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
start_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is past 10 days.

end_time.description: End of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)
end_time.verbose: If not specified, the default is now.

container_count.description: Maximum number of container records to query for

artifact_count.description: Maximum number of artifact records to query for
